definition: first (hotel of its type, store of its type etc)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is the first domestic enterprise manufacturing top-grade fog-proof dressing mirrors cabinet .
sentences.chinese: 是國內首家生產高檔防霧化妝鏡櫃企業。

sentences.english: Among them, Kang force lifts are A shares is the first private enterprises lift.
sentences.chinese: 其中，康力升降機是A股首家的民營升降機企業。

sentences.english: PUMA is the first sports shoe manufacture to offer Velcro fasteners.
sentences.chinese: PUMA是首家採用粘扣帶的運動鞋生產商。

sentences.english: Xiangtan Humanity Hospital is China's first men's brand hospital.
sentences.chinese: 上湘潭博愛醫院是我國首家男科品牌醫院。

sentences.english: Settle of hotel of east of first case forest at Beijing on the west the square austral passenger station.
sentences.chinese: 首家格林東方酒店落戶於北京西客運站南廣場。

sentences.english: This is the first Zhangjiajie was listed on the five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這是張家界首家獲得掛牌的五星級酒店。

sentences.english: China Southern Airlines will become the first Boeing 787 operators.
sentences.chinese: 南航將成爲國內首家波音787運營商。

sentences.english: Baosteel Corporation is the first enterprise to issue environmental report in the iron and steel industry in China.
sentences.chinese: 寶鋼股份是我國鋼鐵行業首家發佈環境報告的企業。

sentences.english: Just imagine his joy when he met me – the first "corozo supplier" in China at that time !
sentences.chinese: 那時我還是內地首家引進果實扣的供應商而已。

sentences.english: Our company is the first Coordinated Process Company to supply and manufacture rinks in China.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是國內首家真冰滑冰場供應制作一條龍企業。

sentences.english: It is the first domestic specialized is engaged in the glassware production of large private enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 是國內首家專業從事玻璃儀器生產的大型民營企業。

sentences.english: The first sub-branch in Shenyang has recently opened.
sentences.chinese: 最近我們在瀋陽的首家支行開業。

sentences.english: Singapore Air is the first airline in the world to receive and operate the A380.
sentences.chinese: 新航是全球首家使用A380的航空公司。

sentences.english: The company is China's first development and production of non-friable chimney professional manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是中國首家開發生產不易碎燈罩的專業廠家。

sentences.english: The country's first biological pharmaceutical professional bank opens in Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 全國首家生物醫藥專業銀行長沙掛牌。

sentences.english: He established 1st private law office, Yongsen law Office, in the Province in 1994.
sentences.chinese: 1994年創辦廣東首家個體制永森律師事務所。

definition: to open a business/to open a practice/open (for business)
to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth
the whole family/the same family/the family ... (when preceded by a family name)/group
to enter and garrison/(fig.) to establish a presence in
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
to offer (goods or services)/to open (for business etc)
to establish/to set up/to be tenable/to hold water
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to blossom everywhere/to spring up all over the place/to flourish on a large scale
to draw into/to pull into/to introduce
